subject: Add no-firmware subpackage
commitMessage:
Add no-firmware subpackage

This package aim to be the Linux standard way to turn on and off bluetooth 
device whitout firmware.

        -  Spec file modifications (rpmlint error) : Summary; Licence; Group; 
	   Replace lib/systemd/system by macro %{_unitdir}

        -  Replace manifest with default floor

        -  Add changelog

        -  Fix TZPC-3687


Signed-off-by: Victor Hakoun <victor.hakoun@eurogiciel.fr>
